name: Galactic Miner (lukasyato)
description:
A future civilization has been discovered. people of the future have changed. now you as a miner have to repair this dying civilization by surviving on multiple planets.

Feature

  • Easy to play
    Click material icon to get materials
  • Travel any Planet!
    you can travel any planet to get many resources
  • Crafting for more survivable
    There are many crafting item that you can craft.
